ItemizedList.ListItem:
Thrombocytopenia (low platelet levels). It is used in:Adults with chronic immune thrombocytopenia (ITP), a condition in which platelets are destroyed by the immune system.Children aged 1 year and older who have had ITP for at least 6 months.
Romiplostim is used in certain patients with ITP who have not gotten better with other treatment.
